meanings.definition: Entrusted with a task or responsibility.
meanings.sent1: The intrusted student carefully completed the important project.
meanings.sent2: She is the intrusted leader of the team, making important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The intrusted puppy was left in charge of guarding the house.
meanings.sent4: The intrusted key unlocked the secrets of the ancient treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The intrusted secret was safe with the loyal friend.

meanings.definition: Given as a responsibility or duty.
meanings.sent1: The intrusted task was completed with great care by the team.
meanings.sent2: The intrusted job required attention to detail and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The intrusted cookie was the special treat for the hardworking student.
meanings.sent4: The intrusted mission was accomplished successfully by the brave soldier.
meanings.sent5: The intrusted duty fell on the capable shoulders of the young officer.
